modName: Mia - Ohmes-Raht Thief - CBBE TBBP Standalone
summary:
Add Mia, an ohmes-raht thief follower, who lives in the thieves guild headquarter.
Standalone with CBBE body, Apachii hairs, custom body texture.
descriptionHtml:
Check out my other mods [u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6886180/?tb=mods&pUp=1]HERE[/url][/u]

"Similar to the race of men, save for their tails and short, light-colored fur, the Ohmes-raht may easily be mistaken as men at a distance." ([url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Lore:Khajiit#Ohmes-raht]UESP[/url])

Mia is a ohmes-raht khajiit, a thief girl follower, who live in the ragged flagon - cistern.
You need to complete the quest "taking care of business" before you can recruit her.
She can be married, and can be stewart of one of your Hearthfire house.

She is a combat ranger, using bow and dual-wield with daggers.

Mia as her own routine when inside the thieves guild headquarter. She trains with dagger and bow in the training room, she have her lunch at
the ragged flagon, and she sleep in Sapphire's bed (bed onwnership has been change)

Mia is standalone with CBBE body and Apachii hairs.
She has default custom clothes and a set of thieves guild armor in her inventory. She will equip it as soon as you recruit her.
Both are made with meshes from Cotyounoyume.

She also own two daggers (retex of the Blade of Woe) with a paralysis enchantment, a hunting bow and 50 steel arrows.

Her perks are ligthfoot, muffle, silent roll and powershot.

I will be happy if you add images of Mia in action !!

[b][i][color=blue]VERSION[/color] FRANÇAISE [color=red]DISPONIBLE[/color] sur la page des téléchargements.[/i][/b]

There is also optional BBP and TBBP meshes for people using custom skeleton like XPMS. Just overwrite Mia's body files with the one fitting you requirements.

[u][size=4]CREDITS AND THANKS :[/size][/u]

I wish to thanks the following authors to give me permissions to use their works

The armor and clothes are mashup from
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5564/?]a little sexy apparel replacer - for CBBE UNP ADEC - with LSAR Addon by Cotyounoyume[/url]

Mia's body is
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by Caliente[/url]

Mia's hairs are
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/url]

The textures of Mia's bodice come from
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21271/?]Bouncy Bodices and Booties for UNPB and UNP also BBP BBPx 7B by Dikr[/url]
thanks to Dikr to permit free use of his textures

Caliente again for this great tool
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio by Caliente[/url]

Great thanks to Nuska for provide free use of
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48329/?]Character Mod Resource Pack by nuska[/url]

and to Mambo for the same reason
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28263/?]Pubic Hair Alternatives CBBE by Mambo[/url]

And to Eiries for his help and advice.

[i]All assets I'm using in this version of Mia are from the authors above or believe to be free-for-use. If you see assets belonging to you, please PM me.[/i]

Before anyone asks :

- The body texture is mashup from caliente's human and khajiit textures ;
- Face texture is mashup from caliente's human and nuska's ohmes-rath textures ;
- Eyes are mashup from nuska's and vanilla.
author: ZorlackPanzer
